name: Hero Flash!! (Skill)
text: Once every 2 of your turns, at the beginning of the turn, add to your hand 1 of the following cards (in the order listed below) from outside of your Deck: ● 2nd Turn: "H - Heated Heart" ● 4th Turn: "E - Emergency Call" ● 6th Turn: "R - Righteous Justice" ● 8th Turn: "O - Oversoul" ● 10th Turn: "Hero Flash!!" This Skill will only activate if you Duel using a Deck that has 4 or more "HERO" Normal Monsters in your Deck and it contains no monsters other than "HERO" monsters. (Extra Deck does not count.)
